dict.acceptation: 精确的；绝对的；严格的，严谨的；[植]笔直的；

sent.orig: This specifies Strict input method for Thai locale.
sent.trans: 以上命令设置了泰国区域设置中的Strict输入法。

sent.orig: Everything went on in pretty good order, strict cleanliness, and strict punctuality; even pretty strict honesty.
sent.trans: 一切都很的秩序地、清洁地、精密地、至很真正的进行着。

sent.orig: Have strong technical force, advanced manufacturing equipment and strict means testing, strict quality control system.
sent.trans: 拥有雄厚的技术力量，先进的生产设备和严格的测试手段，严格的质量控制体系。

sent.orig: A gentleman sets strict demands on himself a petty man sets strict demands on others.
sent.trans: 孔子说：“君子严格要求自己，小人苛刻要求别人。”（三）君子成人之美，不成人之恶。

sent.orig: Good people be strict with themselves, bad people be strict with others.
sent.trans: 君子求诸己，小人求诸人。
